meta.title: Ivan Kukshyn
meta.description: Young web developer creating responsive and functional websites.

info.description: Junior Web and Mobile Web Developers. Looking for a work-study program. Date: April 22 april 2025 to April 22, 2026.

about.about_heading: Who i am? What i want?
about.about_p1: Hello, my name is Ivan Kukshyn.
about.about_p2: I'm 19 years old and I'm studying web and mobile development at the “La F@brique Numérique 41” in Blois.
about.about_p3: I'm from Ukraine and I'm now looking for a work-study opportunity in a company where I can apply my knowledge and skills to real-life projects and gain valuable experience working in a team of professionals.
about.about_p4: My current stack includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript. I'm actively learning WordPress, Bootstrap and JavaScript. I'm always looking to improve my skills. I'm willing to learn from experienced and contribute to the success of projects.

project_1.title: Cité du numerique (Digital City)
